examples: Our company puts the emphasis on quality.

words.defineEn: a principle of design that refers to the visual importance or prominence of certain elements in a composition

examples: The charity organization's mission statement emphasized the belief that poverty is no sin and that everyone deserves dignity and respect.

words.defineVi: hành động gán (ai đó hoặc cái gì đó) cho một lớp hoặc danh mục cụ thể

examples: And Schiff and Feinstein were pretty emphatic that we had to say something.
